title: Google Pixel 3a won't restart
content:
Hello,
So my Google Pixel 3a froze for the 1st time ever, so I held down the start button on the side and it shut down the phone...now it won't start up again!
I've held down the start button for 1 minute and kept it charged by plug and computer (20 mins each)

Is it done for or is there some hope?

Thank you,
Starving Artist
